name: Pokémon Hoenn Adventures
overview: Hoenn Adventures is a remastering of Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire with a series of new features such as graphical improvements, division of physical and special attacks, sprite improvements, among many other things. This ROMHack is a remastering of Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire so, as would be logical, it has the same story as these installments; however, this HackROM brings some changed details to make this game a totally different experience.
